reporting-org.narrative: The William and Flora Hewlett Foundation

title.narrative: "for support of a public expenditure program"

description.narrative: "This grant will allow México Evalúa to consolidate work on their Public Expenditure and Accountability Program by (1) designing a set of impact indicators to monitor and evaluate the performance of the public health sector; (2) promoting accountability in the planning and execution of public infrastructure in the health sector; and (3) contributing to more transparency and accountability in the planning, execution, and monitoring of public finances."
